sections.heading: Creation
sections.text:
of brand inspection districts; animals subject to inspection; adoption and

publication of regulations.

sections.heading: Removal
Transportation
sections.text: of saddle horse without brand inspection or livestock movement permit.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
to consign for slaughter, slaughter or transfer ownership within brand

inspection district without visual inspection and issuance of clearance

certificate.

sections.heading: Assembly
sections.text: and holding of animals for brand inspection.

sections.heading: Brand
sections.text:
inspection clearance certificate: Issuance upon completion of inspection;

contents; disposition of copies of certificate.

sections.heading: Seizure
sections.text:
of privately owned animals by governmental entity: Approval by court; submission

of court order to Department; exception.

sections.heading: Refusal
sections.text:
to issue certificate or permit: Grounds; duty of Department and inspector to

prevent unlawful removal of animals.

sections.heading: Inspector
Seizure
sections.text:
and disposal of animals by agricultural police officer when legal ownership

cannot be determined by inspector.

sections.heading: Right
sections.text: of Department to inspect animals under other laws unaffected.
